localBaserowIntegrationType.localBaserowWarning: Authorizing your account gives everyone who has edit permissions to the application full access to the data you have access to. It's possible to create a second user, give the right permissions and use that one.

serviceType.localBaserowGetRowDescription: Read a single row from a Baserow table.
serviceType.localBaserowListRowsDescription: Reads multiple rows from a Baserow table.
serviceType.localBaserowAggregateRowsDescription: Summarizes a field in a Baserow table.
serviceType.localBaserowCreateRowDescription: Creates a new row in a Baserow table.
serviceType.localBaserowUpdateRowDescription: Updates an existing row in a Baserow table.
serviceType.localBaserowDeleteRowDescription: Deletes a row in a Baserow table.
serviceType.localBaserowRowsCreatedDescription: Triggered when rows are created in a Baserow table.
serviceType.localBaserowRowsUpdatedDescription: Triggered when rows are updated in a Baserow table.
serviceType.localBaserowRowsDeletedDescription: Triggered when rows are deleted in a Baserow table.
serviceType.coreHTTPTriggerDescription: Triggered when an HTTP request is received.
serviceType.coreHTTPRequestDescription: Sends an HTTP request to a specified endpoint.
serviceType.coreRouterEdgesRequired: At least one edge is required
serviceType.coreRouterDescription: Routes the workflow to the next branch based on a condition.
serviceType.coreSMTPEmailDescription: Sends an email using SMTP configuration.
serviceType.errorFilterInError: At least one filter is misconfigured
serviceType.errorSortingInError: At least one sort is misconfigured
serviceType.corePeriodicDescription: Triggers the workflow on a periodic basis at specified intervals
serviceType.aiAgentDescription: Execute AI prompts using configured generative AI models.
serviceType.errorNoChoicesProvided: No choices provided for choice output type
serviceType.slackWriteMessageDescription: Sends a message to a specific Slack #channel

localBaserowForm.userMessage: By creating this connection, you're authorizing the application to use your account to make changes in your local Baserow workspace.

aiForm.description: Configure AI provider settings for this integration. By default, workspace AI settings are inherited.
aiForm.workspaceSettingsDescription: This integration inherits AI provider settings from your workspace by default. You can override specific providers below.
aiForm.overrideWorkspaceSettings: Override workspace settings for this provider

aiAgentServiceForm.outputTypeHelp: Choose how the AI should format its response. If you define choices, you force the model to respond only with one of those choices.
aiAgentServiceForm.temperatureHelp: Controls randomness. Lower values (0-0.3) are more focused and deterministic. Higher values (0.7-2.0) are more creative and varied.
aiAgentServiceForm.choicesRequired: At least one choice is required

localBaserowGetRowForm.rowFieldHelpText: Leave this value empty to return the first row.

localBaserowGetRowForm.noTableChosenForSorting: Choose a table to begin using data source sorts.

localBaserowListRowsForm.noTableChosenForSorting: Choose a table to begin using data source sorts.
localBaserowListRowsForm.defaultResultCountHelp: The default number of records this data source will fetch on your page. Setting the value to 0, and using it on a collection element, will improve performance on page load by only fetching the records when the element is paginated.

serviceRefinementForms.noTableChosenForFiltering: Choose a table to begin using data source filters.
serviceRefinementForms.noTableChosenForSorting: Choose a table to begin using data source sorts.

localBaserowAggregateRowsForm.noTableChosenForFiltering: Choose a table to begin using data source filters.

localBaserowTableServiceConditionalForm.noFilterTitle: You have not yet created a data source filter
localBaserowTableServiceConditionalForm.noFilterText: Data source filters allow you to show Baserow table rows that apply to your conditions.
localBaserowTableServiceConditionalForm.relatedFieldNotFound: The related field is not found.
localBaserowTableServiceConditionalForm.filterTypeNotFound: The filter type is not compatible.
localBaserowTableServiceConditionalForm.noCompatibleFilterTypesErrorMessage: None of your fields have any compatible filter types
localBaserowTableServiceConditionalForm.useFormulaForValue: Use a formula for this filter
localBaserowTableServiceConditionalForm.useDefaultForValue: Use the default filter for this field

localBaserowTableServiceSortForm.noSortTitle: You have not yet created a data source sort
localBaserowTableServiceSortForm.noSortText: Sorts allow you to sort rows by a field.
localBaserowTableServiceSortForm.noTableChosenForSorting: Choose a table to begin using data source sorts.
localBaserowTableServiceSortForm.sortMisconfigured: The field this sort is associated with has been trashed.

coreHTTPRequestServiceForm.name: Name
coreHTTPRequestServiceForm.nameFieldInvalid: The name must contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, or underscores, and must not start with a dash or an underscore.

slackBotForm.supportDescription: If you need any assistance with pairing with your Slack app, please refer to the steps below.
slackBotForm.supportSetupDescription: Depending on your Slack workspace settings, you may be able to create a new Slack app. Otherwise, an admin will need to do this for you. If you are re-using an existing app which can write messages, skip to the section called 'Pairing with your Slack app'.
slackBotForm.supportSetupStep1: Navigate to your workspace's apps page.
slackBotForm.supportSetupStep2: Create a new app, choose 'From scratch' and enter a name. Select the workspace your app should operate in, and click 'Create'.
slackBotForm.supportSetupStep3: In the left sidebar, navigate to 'OAuth & Permissions', scroll down to Scopes and under 'Bot Token Scopes', select 'Add an OAuth Scope'.
slackBotForm.supportSetupStep4:
To allow your app to post messages, add the 
chat:write
scope.
slackBotForm.supportPairingStep1: If your app is new: navigate to the 'Settings' > 'Install App'. Click the green button to install the app to your workspace.
slackBotForm.supportPairingStep2: Copy your 'Bot User OAuth Token' and store it in the 'Bot User Token' field in this form.
slackBotForm.supportPairingStep3:
Finally, if your app is new: in Slack, invite your app to your chosen channel with 
/invite @yourAppName yourChannel

slackWriteMessageServiceForm.alertMessage: This action must be paired with a Slack app. Please follow the guide in the integrations popup to get started.
slackWriteMessageServiceForm.channelNoPrefix: Remove the '#' before the channel name.

routerForm.defaultEdgeLabelDescription: Optionally choose the label to display on the default branch.
routerForm.branchesDescription: Branches allow you to only execute nodes when a condition is met. Branches are executed left to right until a condition is met, otherwise the default branch will be executed.
routerForm.branchConditionPlaceholder: If true, we follow this branch.
routerForm.edgeDeletionLastEdge: You cannot delete the last branch.
routerForm.edgeDeletionHasOutput: A branch cannot be deleted if it has an output.

periodicForm.intervalHelper: Choose how frequently you want this workflow to run
periodicForm.minuteHelper: This workflow will run every specified minutes
periodicForm.hourHelper: This workflow will run every hour at the specified minute in your local timezone ({timezone})
periodicForm.dayHelper: This workflow will run every day at the specified time in your local timezone ({timezone})
periodicForm.weekHelper: This workflow will run every week on the specified day and time in your local timezone ({timezone})
periodicForm.monthHelper: This workflow will run every month on the specified day and time in your local timezone ({timezone})
periodicForm.deactivatedText: This periodic trigger has been automatically deactivated due to consecutive failures.

localBaserowUpsertRowServiceForm.fieldMappingPlaceholderBoolean: Choose a boolean value, e.g. true
localBaserowUpsertRowServiceForm.noTableSelectedMessage: Choose a table to begin configuring your fields.
localBaserowUpsertRowServiceForm.noWritableFields: This table does not contain any writable fields.
